case.name: SZDCR v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 350 (1 March 2006)

citances.sentence: I refer to the decisions of Rares J in the Federal Court in SZGGS v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 224 and also by his Honour in SZDCR v Minister for Immigration & Multicultural & Indigenous Affairs [2006] FCA 350.
